message.content:
cs.FL, cs.DS, cs.DM, cs.CC, cs.LO

Reasoning: 
- cs.FL (Formal Languages and Automata Theory) is the most likely category as the paper deals with synchronization problems in automata. 
- cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms) is also likely as the paper discusses algorithmic questions related to synchronization in automata. 
- cs.DM (Discrete Mathematics) is relevant as the paper provides bounds on the length of shortest synchronizing words. 
- cs.CC (Computational Complexity) is relevant as the paper discusses the complexity of various problems related to monotonic automata. 
- cs.LO (Logic in Computer Science) is relevant as the paper deals with properties of automata and their transitions.
